title: What are the languages spoken in Turkmenistan? - Quora

response.answer_text: They speak Turkmen (you should know, however, that the word Turkmen can in neighbouring countries be used for referring to languages and dialects that aren’t necessary the same as Turkmenistan Turkmen). Turkmen is an Oghuz Turkic language which is very similar to Turkish in Turkey and Azerbaijanian in Azerbaijan. Interestingly, the s’s and z’s are in Turkmen pronounced the same as the two English th’s.
Turkmenistan is isolated inward looking gas rich ex Soviet country. They speak Turkmen, Uzbek and obivously Russian. Check this video how the elites celebrate birthday of the new Turkmenbashi:
